code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=_ref=>{let{currentUser,onLogout}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"bg-blue-800 text-white shadow-lg",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container mx-auto px-4 py-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/",className:"flex items-center space-x-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/Logo.png",alt:"African Nations League",className:"w-12 h-12"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-2xl font-bold",children:"African Nations League"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"flex items-center space-x-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"hover:text-blue-200 transition-colors",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/tournament",className:"hover:text-blue-200 transition-colors",children:"Tournament"}),currentUser?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[currentUser.role==='representative'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/dashboard",className:"hover:text-blue-200 transition-colors",children:"Team Dashboard"}),currentUser.role==='admin'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/admin",className:"hover:text-blue-200 transition-colors",children:"Admin"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-sm",children:[currentUser.email," (",currentUser.role,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onLogout,className:"bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 px-3 py-1 rounded text-sm transition-colors",children:"Logout"})]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/auth",className:"hover:text-blue-200 transition-colors",children:"Login"})]})]})})});};export default Header;
